Name: Flag
Notes: A decorative flag that waves in the wind. FlagPeachCastleC and FlagSurfing will slowly turn transparent the closer the player gets to them.

Obj_arg1.Name: Pole Length
Obj_arg1.Description: The length of the optional and decorative pole that the flag gets attached to. Default is 0.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Furthermore, the object will not appear initially.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
